BIC:

Finally!  Finally he arrived to the hills.  He drop=
ped his stasis pod 
off on the ground and started to search the hills for a=
 cave or 
cavern that he could call home as he tried desperately to rescue =

himself.  He only had enough food to last for a few weeks and he 
wasn't s=
ure if he could eat the organic life.

After about an hour of searching the=
 hills he found a cave that was 
big enough for him to occupy.  He entered =
the cave cautiously 
worrying if one of the organic creators of the planet =
called it home 
much like he was prepared to do.  After entering the cave a=
 couple 
hundred feet, he decided it was unoccupied and he was prepared to =

call it home.  

He left the cave and climbed back to his stasis pod and b=
egan to drag 
it to his new home.  He was still worried that he would die o=
n this 
planet and that no one would know that he was on the planet.
